data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Scheme of Arrangement
data.news_body: We wish to inform you that the Company has received an Order dated December 18 2025 from the Honble National Company Law Trubunal New Delhi Bench vide its Order dated 18.12.2025 allowed Companys First Motion application in connection with the above-mentioned matter. A copy of the Order is enclosed herewith.

data.caption: Disclosure/Intimation Under Regulation 30 Of SEBI (LODR) Regulations 2015
data.news_body:
This is in reference to the COmpanys letter dated 19.09.2025 in relation to Show Cause Notice issued by the Securities and Exchange Board of India (SEBI) to  Mr. Anil Arora Ex. CFO Mr. Bharat Bhushan Mehta Ex. CFO and Mr. Ashok Kumar Shukla Company Secretary.

In this regard we wish to inform you that Adjudication Officer of SEBI  vide its order dated December 17 2025 has disposed of the aforesaid Show Cause Notices issued to the above-mentioned individulas without imposition of any monetary penalty by inter-alia oserving that the alleged violation is not established against the Noticees.

This is for the information of the Members of the Exchange.

data.descriptor: Format of the Initial Disclosure to be made by an entity identified as a Large Corporate : Annexure
data.caption: Format of the Initial Disclosure to be made by an entity identified as a Large Corporate : Annexure A
data.news_body:
Format of Initial Disclosure to be made by an entity identified as a Large Corporate.

Sr. No. Particulars Details
1Name of CompanyMawana Sugars Ltd
2CIN NO.L74100DL1961PLC003413
3 Outstanding borrowing of company as on 31st March / 31st December as applicable (in Rs cr) 0.00
4Highest Credit Rating during the previous FY BBB
4aName of the Credit Rating Agency issuing the Credit Rating mentioned in (4)ICRA LIMITED
5Name of Stock Exchange# in which the fine shall be paid in case of shortfall in the required borrowing under the frameworkBSE


We confirm that we are a Large Corporate as per the applicability criteria given under the SEBI circular SEBI/HO/DDHS/CIR/P/2018/144 dated November 26 2018. No



Name of the Company Secretary: Ashok Kumar Shukla
Designation: Company Secretary
EmailId: ashokshukla@mawanasugars.com
Name of the Chief Financial Officer: Vikash
Designation: Chief Financial Officer
EmailId: vikash@mawanasugars.com

Date: 29/04/2025

Note: In terms para of 3.2(ii) of the circular beginning F.Y 2022 in the event of shortfall in the mandatory borrowing through debt securities a fine of 0.2% of the shortfall shall be levied by Stock Exchanges at the end of the two-year block period. Therefore an entity identified as LC shall provide in its initial disclosure for a financial year the name of Stock Exchange to which it would pay the fine in case of shortfall in the mandatory borrowing through debt markets.

data.caption: Submission Of Standalone And Consolidated Audited Financial Results For The Quarter And Year Ended On 31.03.2023.
data.news_body:
1. In terms of the Regulation 33(3) of the Securities and Exchange Board of India (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015, we enclose herewith the followings:

i) Standalone and Consolidated Audited Financial Results for the quarter and year ended on 31.03.2023 along with Audit Report of the Statutory Auditors.
ii) Declaration of unmodified opinion.


2. Recommended a dividend of 30% i.e. Rs. 3/- per Equity Share of face value of Rs.10/- each for the financial year ended on 31.03.2023.

3. Decided to hold 59th Annual General Meeting of the company on 14th July, 2023 through Video Conferencing ('VC') / Other Audio Visual Means ('OAVM')

data.caption: Standalone And Consolidated Unaudited Financial Results For The Quarter And Nine Months Ended On  31.12.2022
data.news_body:
The Board of Directors of the Company in its meeting held today (i.e. 14.02.2023), inter-alia considered, approved and taken on record Standalone and Consolidated Unaudited Financial Results of the Company for the Quarter and Nine Months ended on 31.12.2022.

In terms of the Regulation 33(3) of the Securities and Exchange Board of India (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015, we enclose herewith Standalone and Consolidated Unaudited Financial Results of the Company for the Quarter and Nine Months ended on 31.12.2022 along with the Limited Review Report.

The Board Meeting commenced at 12:45 P.M. and concluded at 14.00 P.M.


These results are been published in the newspapers.
